Maximize the Power of Technology with Digital Transformation

MapKloud transforms your business processes with digital transformation and technology consulting. By maximizing the power of technology with modern solutions and comprehensive support, we enhance your efficiency.

LEARN MORE

The Address of Modern Solutions!

At MapKloud, we offer a wide range of services in digital transformation and technology. We work to facilitate businesses' transition to modern infrastructures and help them make the most of the opportunities technology provides.

OUR SERVICES

Our Services

Comprehensive Orchestration and Management Consulting

We provide design, deployment, and optimization services in Kubernetes, OpenShift, and multi-cloud architectures.

Cloud Transformation and Management Consulting

We deliver secure and scalable solutions by providing cloud strategy, migration, and deployment services on AWS, Azure, and GCP.

IoT Integration and Solution Consulting

We ensure the secure and efficient management of your IoT devices by connecting them to cloud systems. We develop solutions specifically for the agriculture, manufacturing, and automotive sectors.

Technology Consulting and Support Services

We address your corporate needs in information technology and software, supporting your transition to the latest and most secure software technologies.
